name: Infinitely up 2
description: Infinitely up 2 - this is the second part of the physical puzzle, where you need to build a tower of randomly drawn shapes. The higher your tower the more points you get. Can you build the highest tower?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
